mapper.insert: insert into recipe(recipe_no, recipe_title, recipe_info, recipe_time, recipe_click, recipe_like, recipe_hashtag, recipe_writetime, recipe_edittime, recipe_difficulty) values(recipe_seq.nextval, #{recipeTitle}, #{recipeInfo}, #{recipeTime}, 0, 0, #{recipeHashtag} #{recipeWritetime}, #{recipeEdittime}, #{recipeDifficulty})
mapper.update: update recipe set recipe_title = #{recipeTitle}, recipe_info = #{recipeInfo}, recipe_time = #{recipeTime}, recipe_hashtag = #{recipeHashtag}, recipe_difficulty = #{recipeDifficulty}, where recipe_no = #{recipeNo}
